## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G09880](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G09880)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATB BETA</u>
- **Gene Name:** Protein phosphatase 2A regulatory B
- **Description:**   Protein phosphatase 2A regulatory B subunit family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G09880.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G09880.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [pp2ab-alpha/beta]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Double mutants show defects in male and female meiosis and reduced fertility. No obvious vegetative phenotype.
## Literature:
   - [Differential expression of three Arabidopsis genes encoding the B&#x27; regulatory  subunit of protein phosphatase 2A.](https://www.doi.org/10.1111/j.1432-1033.1997.00156.x)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1111/j.1432-1033.1997.00156.x](https://www.doi.org/10.1111/j.1432-1033.1997.00156.x);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[9128737](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9128737/)
   - [PROTEIN PHOSHATASE 2A B&#x27;α and β Maintain Centromeric Sister Chromatid Cohesion  during Meiosis in Arabidopsis.](https://www.doi.org/10.1104/pp.18.00281)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1104/pp.18.00281](https://www.doi.org/10.1104/pp.18.00281);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[30061120](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30061120/)
